definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: The issue of human nature was a controvertible question of Chinese philosophy in the long time.
sentences.chinese: 人性问题是中国哲学史上争论不定的问题。

sentences.english: The issue of freedom has always been a perpetual problem in the philosophy history.
sentences.chinese: 自由问题一直是哲学史的一个永恒问题。

sentences.english: The studies of the history of Chinese philosophy in the past days often followed the line of western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 以往中国哲学史的研究往往比附于西方哲学。

sentences.english: "Substance" is a kernel category in the history of western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: “实体”是西方哲学史上的核心范畴。

sentences.english: A proposition constructs a kind of view on the history of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 一个命题铸就了一种哲学史观。

sentences.english: The history research initiates its clue by the Chinese philosophy history exploration.
sentences.chinese: 本院的史学研究以中国哲学史的探索肇其端绪。

sentences.english: Chuang-Tzu is the pioneer in the studies of death philosophy in China.
sentences.chinese: 庄子则是中国哲学史上死亡哲学研究的开创者。

sentences.english: In Chinese philosophical history, there are conflict and mergence among Confucianism, Taoism and Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 在中国哲学史上，儒佛道三教之间既冲突又融合。

sentences.english: Leibniz occupies a prominent place in the history of mathematics and the history of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 莱布尼茨在数学史和哲学史上都占有重要地位。

sentences.english: Hegel was the first person who gave a precise definition to quality.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔在哲学史上第一次对质作出了准确的界定。

sentences.english: Two broad sub-fields of philosophy are logic and the history of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 哲学涵盖很广的两个次领域为逻辑学和哲学史。

sentences.english: Plekhanov is a turn point in the history of Marxist philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 在马克思主义哲学史上，普列汉诺夫是一个转折点。

sentences.english: Part One reviews the development of self-consciousness in the history of western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，回顾自我意识在西方哲学史中的发展历程。

sentences.english: Platonism occupied a dominant position in traditional Western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图主义在西方哲学史上长期占统治地位。

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
